title: Hubmap sample suspension template schema
description: Hubmap sample suspension template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.19

propertyDescriptions.sample_id: The HuBMAP ID for the sample assigned by the ingest portal. An example value might be "HBM743.CKJW.876"
propertyDescriptions.source_storage_time_value: How long was the source material (parent) stored, prior to this sample being processed. For suspensions, this would be the length of time the tissue block was stored prior to the initiation of the dissociation process.
propertyDescriptions.preparation_medium: The medium used during the sample preparation
propertyDescriptions.preparation_condition: The condition by which the preparation occurred, such as was the sample placed in dry ice during the preparation.
propertyDescriptions.processing_time_value: How long the tissue was being handled before the initial preservation. For a suspension this would be the length of time from when the tissue block is removed from the freezer, dissociated and processed to the point where by the suspension is put into the initial preservation buffer.
propertyDescriptions.storage_medium: What was the sample preserved in.
propertyDescriptions.storage_method: The method by which the sample was stored, after preparation and before the assay was performed.
propertyDescriptions.quality_criteria: For example, RIN: 8.7. For suspensions, measured by visual inspection prior to cell lysis or defined by known parameters such as wells with several cells or no cells. This can be captured at a high level. "OK" or "not OK", or with more specificity such as "debris", "clump", "low clump".
propertyDescriptions.suspension_entity: The type of single cell entity derived from isolation protocol.
propertyDescriptions.suspension_entity_number: Total number of cell/nuclei yielded post dissociation and enrichment.
propertyDescriptions.suspension_enriched_target: If the suspension was enriched, then this is the target of the enrichment.
propertyDescriptions.notes: Miscellaneous details about the sample, not captured in the existing metadata fields.
